channel.description: Recent content in virtual-dom on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Why Virtual DOM is fast?
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: React and Vue, two popular front-end frameworks, both use Virtual DOM to improve page rendering efficiency. Understanding the concept of Virtual DOM sheds light on an important aspect of performance optimization on the client side.
